name: part_003
file: tmp_【#ラプラス生誕祭2023】特別番組：らぷらすといっしょ！みんなかつもくせよ！【ラプラス・ダークネス⧸ホロライブ】 [MSIxNFblrCY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: La+ Darknesss performs 'Shiny Smily Story' in a colorful, whimsical virtual studio.
Cinematic shots of various flowers including cherry blossoms and wisteria under a bright sky.
A nature scene with a pond and lush trees. La+ begins her voiceover introduction.
La+ walks up a long outdoor staircase and observes local features like the 'Flower Train' and small creatures.
La+ reaches a lookout tower, climbs the spiral stairs, and admires the expansive view from the top.

subtitles.original: 踊るステップで...
subtitles.english: With dancing steps...

subtitles.original: 旅の途中...
subtitles.english: On the way of our journey...

subtitles.original: 世界を越えよう
subtitles.english: Let's cross the world

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, go!

subtitles.original: 全方位お仕事も
subtitles.english: All directions and work too

subtitles.original: 止まらない全力進展中
subtitles.english: Unstoppable full-speed progress

subtitles.original: Fu!
subtitles.english: Fu!

subtitles.original: 夢を書き換えたら
subtitles.english: If we rewrite our dreams

subtitles.original: 追いかけ続けよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep chasing them

subtitles.original: 共鳴しあうファンファーレ
subtitles.english: The fanfares resonating together

subtitles.original: Go!
subtitles.english: Go!

subtitles.original: Shiny Smily Story / 作詞：金丸佳史 / 作曲：中野領太
subtitles.english: Shiny Smily Story / Lyrics: Yoshifumi Kanamaru / Composer: Ryota Nakano

subtitles.original: だからもっと夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: So I want to chase my dreams even more

subtitles.original: ワクワク止まらない
subtitles.english: The excitement won't stop

subtitles.original: 想像越えてく世界見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a world that exceeds your imagination

subtitles.original: 期待してみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try having expectations

subtitles.original: 後悔なんてさせられない
subtitles.english: I won't let you have any regrets

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った鼓動で
subtitles.english: With each of our different heartbeats

subtitles.original: 走り出そう
subtitles.english: Let's start running

subtitles.original: みんな、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you!

subtitles.original: #らぷらすとおでかけしてみよう！
subtitles.english: #Let's go for an outing with La+!

subtitles.original: 良い子の皆、刮目せよ！
subtitles.english: Good children, pay attention!

subtitles.original: 吾輩のお名前は、ラプラス・ダークネスだよ。
subtitles.english: My name is La+ Darknesss.

subtitles.original: お姉さん、普段はお出かけとかあんまりしないんだけど
subtitles.english: I usually don't go out much,

subtitles.original: 今日はとっても天気が良いから、お散歩をしていこうか。
subtitles.english: but since the weather is so nice today, shall we go for a walk?

subtitles.original: 桜の時期はちょっと過ぎちゃったし
subtitles.english: The cherry blossom season is over,

subtitles.original: 紫陽花の季節もまだだけど
subtitles.english: and it's not quite hydrangea season yet,

subtitles.original: お花さんや動物さん、たくさん見つかるといいね。
subtitles.english: but I hope we find lots of flowers and animals.

subtitles.original: 長い！
subtitles.english: So long!

subtitles.original: 階段、長い！
subtitles.english: The stairs are so long!

subtitles.original: 普段お出かけしねえからな。
subtitles.english: Since I don't usually go out...

subtitles.original: あーもう辛だわ。
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm already at my limit.

subtitles.original: ちょっと無理かも知れん。
subtitles.english: This might be a bit impossible.

subtitles.original: 注意
subtitles.english: Caution

subtitles.original: 公園の中はとっても広いんだけど
subtitles.english: The park is very large,

subtitles.original: フラワートレインで楽々移動できちゃうみたい。
subtitles.english: but it seems you can move around easily on the Flower Train.

subtitles.original: そこまでの坂道頑張ったのに
subtitles.english: Even though I worked hard on the slope up to that point,

subtitles.original: 一瞬で追い抜かされちゃった。
subtitles.english: it overtook me in an instant.

subtitles.original: しばらく登ってきて
subtitles.english: I've been climbing for a while now

subtitles.original: もうヘトヘト。
subtitles.english: and I'm exhausted.

subtitles.original: 結構登ったと思うんだけど
subtitles.english: I think I've climbed quite a bit,

subtitles.original: 頂上はまだかな？
subtitles.english: but is the summit still further?

subtitles.original: あ、結構階段が長いね。
subtitles.english: Ah, the stairs are quite long, aren't they?

subtitles.original: おお、この時点でめっちゃ高いかも。
subtitles.english: Wow, even at this point, it feels really high.

subtitles.original: おお、すご！
subtitles.english: Oh, wow!

subtitles.original: おおー！
subtitles.english: Ooooh!

subtitles.original: 高ーい！
subtitles.english: So high!

subtitles.original: 結構登ってきたんだな、吾輩。
subtitles.english: I've climbed quite a way.

subtitles.original: ここまで登ってきた疲れが一気に吹き飛ぶくらいすっごい景色！
subtitles.english: The scenery is so amazing it blows away all the fatigue from climbing this far!

subtitles.original: 街並みが手のひらに乗せられそうなくらい小さく見える。
subtitles.english: The town looks so small, like you could fit it in the palm of your hand.
